verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captive<s%> ones of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> We were like those who <S%H2492>dream.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> our <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> And our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> with <S%H7440>joyful<s%> <S%H7440>shouting;<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> they <S%H559>said<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H1431>things<s%> for them."
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H1431>things<s%> for us; We are <S%H8056>glad.<s%>
<S%H7725>Restore<s%> our <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> As the <S%H650>streams<s%> in the <S%H5045>South.<s%>

He who <S%H1980>goes<s%> to and <S%H1980>fro<s%> <S%H1058>weeping,<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> [his] <S%H4901>bag<s%> of <S%H2233>seed,<s%> Shall <S%H935>indeed<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> again with a <S%H7440>shout<s%> of <S%H7440>joy,<s%> <S%H5375>bringing<s%> his <S%H485>sheaves<s%> [with him].
